constructor-arg.value: select id, name_Russian, name_Native, year_Of_Release, rating, price, picture_Path from movie;
select id, name_Russian, name_Native, year_Of_Release, description, rating, price, picture_Path from movie where id in (:movieIds);
select id, name_Russian, name_Native, year_Of_Release, rating, price, picture_Path from movie m join movie_genre mg on m.id=mg.movie_id where mg.genre_id =:genreId;
select id, name_Russian, name_Native, year_Of_Release, description, rating, price, picture_Path from movie where id = :movieId;
select id, user_name, user_email, password from users where user_email = :email and password = :password;
insert into reviews (text, user_id, movie_id) values (:text, :userId, :movieId);
select ur.user_id, r.id, r.role from user_roles ur join roles r on ur.role_id=r.id where ur.user_id = :userId;
